vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_8.sol#35-44):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_8.sol#38-41)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_8.sol#39)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_8.sol#35-44):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_8.sol#38-41)
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_8.sol#40)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_8.sol#38-41)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reentrancy_lock (patch_8.sol#42)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_8.sol#27-33):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_8.sol#30)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_8.sol#31)
